metadata.title: CVE-2020-28638 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: ask_password in Tomb 2.0 through 2.7 returns a warning when pinentry-cursesis used and $DISPLAY is non-empty, causing affected users' files to beencrypted with "tomb {W] Detected DISPLAY, but only pinentry-curses isfound." as the encryption key.

criterions.comment: tomb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
